DOC.brief_title: A `` Less-rapid '' Sequence Anesthetic Induction/Intubation Sequence ? Does Apneic Oxygenation Means Oxygenating Laryngoscope Blade Prolong `` Duration Apnea Without Desaturation '' Paralyzed Non-obese Morbidly Obese Patients ?
DOC.detailed_description: Pre-oxygenation/de-nitrogenation three minute spontaneous breathe alternatively four eight deep breath prior rapid sequence anesthetic induction/intubation ( RSII ) patient healthy lung , low oxygen demand normal hemoglobin level allow eight minute safe apnea time DAWD . The study test efficacy Pentax AWSTM video laryngoscope ( VLS ) equip P Blade mean provide apneic oxygenation prolong DAWD . The P Blade sport suction conduit equally well provide conduit oxygen administration . The initial phase study include non-obese healthy ( ASAR 1-2 ) woman patient require endotracheal anesthesia gynecologic ( open laparoscopic ) abdominal surgery . Subsequently cohort morbidly obese patient ( BM I ≥ 40 kg/m2 ) also require gynecologic abdominal access recruit investigation . Participants group ( obese , non-obese ) randomize apneic oxygenation Pentax AWS Laryngoscope apneic oxygenation .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Female patient , 2 . American Society Anesthesiologists Rating 12 , 3 . Aged 18 65 year age 4 . Elective gynecological surgery via abdominal approach ( laparoscopic open ) 5 . Already consent general anesthesia necessitate endotracheal intubation . 6 . Are candidate anesthesia use laryngeal mask airway need 1 . Patient refusal enter study 2 . History difficult mask ventilation 3 . History , anticipate difficult intubation 4 . Heavy Smokers ( > 10 cigarette per day ) 5 . Asthma 6 . Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease 7 . Heart Disease 8 . Renal Liver disease 9 . Neurological disease . 10 . Women score ≥ 3/4 modify Mallampati scale 30 . 11 . Women exhibit sign potential difficult intubation ( limited neck flexion extension ; neck circumference > 30 cm ; prominent incisor ) 12 . Patients baseline rest oxygenation level le 95 % .
